name: Tree of Light
description:
*IMPORTANT*

Tutorial:

Use the arrow keys to move around and Z to grab or drop items in front of you.

If you drop coal (look at screenshots) into the tree it wil grow, the goal of the game is to fully grow the tree. If you drop multiple light sources into the cauldron you get an upgraded light source when you grab it back out.

Story:

You're probably the last survivor on a planet with no suns and one tree left, luckily that tree emits light.
